text: William Allen Egan (October 8, 1914 â€“ May 6, 1984) was an American Democratic politician. He was the first and the fourth governor of the State of Alaska from January 3, 1959 to 1966 and 1970 to 1974. Egan died on May 6, 1984 at the age of 69 from lung cancer in Anchorage, Alaska.The Associated Press. "State tributes mount for Bill Egan, 69", Fairbanks Daily News-Miner. May 7, 1984.
